title: Nasus Help

replies.body: don't ever build IBG. it's trash, just don't. you're better off getting a FH and triforce.

Some things i've learned form playing Nasus a little last season:

1. Don't get greedy for stacks. 300-400 is more then enough to take towers with, so don't sit there stacking every creep as your team is constantly dying.
2. Nasus is all about creating pressure. Threatening to take towers and forcing the enemy to chase you is a lot better then the enemy constantly killing your team.
3. Sometimes grouping is the answer. Most Nasus' get stuck with the idea, "im Nasus, I splitpush and kill towers". Sometimes you just gotta group and help.

Also if you think Baron minions are tough, try Q'ing that damn scuttle crab after he's been killed 5-6 times already LOL can 2-hit blue buff, little crab takes 5.

Situational Advice: Swap with bot lane if they are feeding. If the enemy has a short-range ad, Nasus can farm under tower pretty safely 2v1 and can bait a dive with his Ult which can usually mean he gets 1 or 2 kills before going down.
This is situational though and only works if all the towers are still up, you are level 6, and you already have a Frozen Heart.

Nasus isn't just to build completely tank and call it a day, Sheen related items give him a huge boosts too.

When you play Nasus you look for these stats:
1. CDR
2. HP
3. Armour/Resistances
4. Avoid buying Sunfire at any cost.

If you're ahead or even with the lane opponent you can consider getting perhaps an {{item:3025}}, or just a {{item:3057}} for {{item:3078}} later on.

Otherwise, {{item:3110}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3026}}, are your buddies, go get them (value the situation).

Farm and farm, and get big.
